title: Pbe
body: So I applied for Pbe before i was lvl 30 and my friend who has pbe said you had to be lvl 30. Now that i am lvl 30 do i have to resubmit or am i just more likely to be accepted now

replies.body:
You definitely don't have to be level 30 to be accepted into the PBE. We do tend to look for really active players, though, and a lof of them are level 30. You don't need to resubmit your application since you can only do it once. 

We outline everything about the PBE in [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any questions.
